## ✅ How to Test
<!-- Describe how reviewers can test the changes. -->
1. Checkout this branch:  
   ```sh
   git checkout feature-branch
   ```
2. Run the backend:
   ```sh
   cd backend
   dotnet run
   ```
3. Run the frontend:
   ```sh
   cd frontend
   npm run dev
   ```
4. Test the new feature in the browser.
